data.actual_result: @ is ignored. Even though the ' works fine.
data.short_description: [Overlay] [Possible UK layout specific] The @ Key doesn't work all the time.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a game with overlay enabled! - Open overlay - Simply try and mention someone / use the @ key. (SHIFT + ' on UK Layout) - This isn't very consistent but happens a reasonable amount of time. Changing a server/channel or reopening overlay seems to reset if the @ key does work for m
